text: In a shelter of separate gravities, a special bond arose...
...Though these cats were very different, they soon became very close.
The bond between the two became something magical, as if tied together with string...
..when both cats jumped, and one held on tight, and the other could hang and swing.
They spent so much of their lives together, with love filling their hearts...
...but one day, just like the gravities they live in, fate would pull them apart.
Adopted into separate homes, with the string still between themselves...
...the physical barrier of distance couldn't prevent swinging onto higher shelves.
The two cats realized they could not reach each other with shelves alone...
...sometimes you gotta open a window to get a better view of home.
Out of windows and onto rooftops, the cats looked towards the sky...
...pulling each other towards the clouds meant they would never have to say goodbye.
Now high up in the cradling clouds, never stronger was their love...
...their eternal bond, this magical string, could lift the sky above.
